strapiEvent.name: Culinary Shadows - A Dining In The Dark Experience
strapiEvent.location: Record Downtown - 104 SW A St, Bentonville
strapiEvent.description:
Unleash your senses and step into a world of mystery, as you embark on a dining journey like no other with the one and only local chef, Jeff Wetzel, owner of B-List On The Bricks in Downtown Rogers. In complete darkness, you'll surrender your sight and let your taste buds and sense of touch take the lead, savoring every bite in a completely unique way. With heightened senses and no distractions, you'll discover flavors and textures you never knew existed, and experience food in a way that will leave you breathless. This is not just a meal, it's a culinary experience that will redefine your perception of dining. Sometimes it takes an experience like this to discover and appreciate new things. 

 

This event hosted by NextHome NWA Pro Realty & B-List On The Bricks will be raising money for the Northwest Arkansas Women's Shelter. A charity donation letter of $115 will be emailed directly to you. 

 

Please note, you will be blind folded for the entirety of this event. If you are not comfortable with this or have any food allergies, this may not be the event for you. 

A $115 donation letter will be provided to you upon purchase of tickets.

Please consider a cash tip to your server, as they are volunteering their time for the shelter! 

Refunds will not be issued for any reason.
